*Publisher's Description*

Smart Brevity is a writing and communications manifesto for the information
age. It will teach readers how to communicate better with fewer words and
more punch in their emails, newsletters, presentations, meetings, and much
more at work and in life. The big idea: If you want to get heard in the
information age, you need to change the way you write. Now. Smart Brevity
will teach you how.
